containing_words.word: 波斯尼亚和黑塞哥维那

definition: Republic of Bosnia and Herzegovina (1992-1995), predecessor of Bosnia and Herzegovina 波斯尼亞和黑塞哥維那|波斯尼亚和黑塞哥维那[Bo1 si1 ni2 ya4 he2 Hei1 sai4 ge1 wei2 na4]
pinyin: Bo1 si1 ni2 ya4 he2 Hei1 sai4 ge1 wei2 na4 Gong4 he2 guo2
containing_words.word: 波斯尼亚和黑塞哥维那共和国

sentences.english: Former Bosnian Serb general Ratko Mladic spent sixteen years in hiding.
sentences.chinese: 前波斯尼亚塞族将军姆拉迪奇藏匿花了十六年。

sentences.english: A stabilisation agreement with the European Union has just come into force.
sentences.chinese: 波斯尼亚同欧盟达成的一项稳定协议刚刚生效。

sentences.english: The stirring of renewed secessionist sentiments in Bosnia does the same.
sentences.chinese: 波斯尼亚再度兴起的分裂情绪的搅动亦是如此。

sentences.english: The Baikushev's Pine is a coniferous tree from the species Bosnian Pine situated in Pirin, Bulgaria.
sentences.chinese: 百库西树是针叶树源于保加利亚波斯尼亚松物种。

sentences.english: Bosnia to be selected to compete in the Festival.
sentences.chinese: 这是第一部参加该影节的波斯尼亚电影。

sentences.english: In Bosnia, demography is high politics.
sentences.chinese: 在波斯尼亚，人口政治学是高级政治。

sentences.english: The problem is that many have strayed, not least Bosnia.
sentences.chinese: 问题是大多数的波斯尼亚人都已经迷失了自我。

sentences.english: It was the first film from Bosnia to be selected to compete in the Festival.
sentences.chinese: 这是第一部参加该影节的波斯尼亚电影。

sentences.english: In Bosnia and Kosovo, the issue can be fundamental.
sentences.chinese: 在波斯尼亚和科索沃，这是根本性的问题。

sentences.english: It was the summer of 1995 in a Bosnian refuge camp in Tuzla.
sentences.chinese: 1995年，在图兹拉的波斯尼亚难民集中营。

definition: Sarajevo, capital of Bosnia and Herzegovina
